title: Bloomberg Law Brief: Stein & Painter on Fiduciary Rule (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg Law Brief: Stein & Painter on Fiduciary Rule (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Elliot Stein, a Senior Financials Litigation Analyst for Bloomberg Intelligence, and Richard Painter, a Professor at the University of Minnesota Law School, discuss lawsuits seeking to stop the DOL's rule expanding the fiduciary standard of care for retirement advisers. They speak with June Grasso on "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
(Bloomberg) -- Elliot Stein, a Senior Financials Litigation Analyst for Bloomberg Intelligence, and Richard Painter, a Professor at the University of Minnesota Law School, discuss lawsuits seeking to stop the DOL's rule expanding the fiduciary standard of care for retirement advisers. They speak with June Grasso on "Bloomberg Law."
